allow: Bash(docker-compose exec backend python manage.py migrate:*)
Bash(docker exec nextops_backend python manage.py sync_invoices_to_ots --dry-run)
Bash(docker exec nextops_backend python -c "from django.conf import settings; print(f''DEBUG: {settings.DEBUG}'')")

Bash(docker exec nextops_backend python manage.py shell -c "from invoices.models import Invoice; inv = Invoice.objects.filter(uploaded_file__isnull=False).first(); print(f''ID: {inv.id}''); print(f''Numero: {inv.numero_factura}''); print(f''File URL: {inv.get_file_url()}''); print(f''Uploaded file path: {inv.uploaded_file.path}'')")
